titleStmt.title: Observations upon the Provinces United. And on the state of France. Written by Sr Thomas Overbury.
Sir Thomas Overbury his observations in his travailes upon the state of the Xvii. Provinces as they stood anno Dom. 1609.
titleStmt.author: Overbury, Thomas, Sir, 1581-1613.
Pass, Simon van de, 1595?-1647, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Maxey for Richard Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstan's Church-yard, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: The portrait of the author is signed: SP excudit SP fe., i.e. Simon Pass.
Originally published in 1626 as: Sir Thomas Overbury his observations in his travailes upon the state of the Xvii. Provinces as they stood anno Dom. 1609.
Thomason received his copy in December 1650.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb. 17 1650"; 1 in imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstan's Church-yard
